TopicTitle: [1.12.X] Tantares - Stockalike Soyuz and MIR [16.1][28.05.2024][{Proton Revamp]

Articles.Content:
Well, I'm off work, and it is snowing very heavily. Modding time eh.

YES! Thank You Beale! Also, why not have procedural fairings textures just for this (sorry, may have more suggestions still coming). Also, I have asked several modders this, but would you create a pack of spacecraft parts smaller than that of stock 0.625 meter parts (i.e. parts about 0.35 - 0.05 meters).

Thank you

-Astrofox

I'm using some custom PF textures now, I'll see if I can upload them.

Does anyone have pics of a station using the Mir and Salyut parts in this pack? I need some ideas because I'm planning to build a space station in my career mode.

I have a MIR-alike floating around "somewhere", I'll see if I can get you some pics.

Just tried out the new beta soyuz.

Works good for me.

One question - the new docking port.

Do you plan on releasing a "female" version of the port, or will it link up ok with one/any/some of the existing docking port parts?

The female port, yes, it is model and textured. But not in game yet.

And - it will link with stock 0.625m ports

That's a great mod! Never found it, I will use this a lot, I think!

About docking ports: They should not break compatibility with old stations - that is they retain size and dockingNode, but, maybe you might want to replace them, to be sure.

If you are feeling brave: download the Beta, backup your save game and see if it all explodes / wiggles when loading, if not, you are probably safe.

docking in space with russian technology is so wonderfull

It is true!

Now we need stock heterogeneous ports to make them work correctly!

Does anyone have pics of a station using the Mir and Salyut parts in this pack? I need some ideas because I'm planning to build a space station in my career mode.
I posted my WIP Tantares MIR a few pages back. curtquarquesso also shared his MIR which is more complete (it just needs the Soyuz and Progress).

I don't want to spam this thread with spaceplane since Tantares is rocket-focused, but I finalised my Tanta-MIG design. I built it as a sub-orbital jet, but surprisingly it made it to orbit with 1014m/s of DeltaV left; enough to achieve orbit around the Mun. Flew it home, almost crashed into the mountains, and landed it with 839m/s left.

I posted my WIP Tantares MIR a few pages back. curtquarquesso also shared his MIR which is more complete (it just needs the Soyuz and Progress).

I don't want to spam this thread with spaceplane since Tantares is rocket-focused, but I finalised my Tanta-MIG design. I built it as a sub-orbital jet, but surprisingly it made it to orbit with 1014m/s of DeltaV left; enough to achieve orbit around the Mun. Flew it home, almost crashed into the mountains, and landed it with 839m/s left.

Gah, I had forgotten there was a nice MIR example only a few pages back.

Nice you have achieved SSTO! Even if accidentally.
